ygData.msgSnippet: I didn t have time to end the poll yesterday, and don t have time right now, either, so I guess it ll be open till this evening. Sorry for any inconvenience,

I didn't have time to end the poll yesterday, and don't have time right
now, either, so I guess it'll be open till this evening. Sorry for any
inconvenience, though I think alot of you are thankful for the extra time.




On Tue, 1 May 2001, RoboRick007 wrote:

> OOC: Again I must say 'please vote for me'. Why you ask? Because I want
> nothing but good things for this RPG. Since I joined back in July 2000,
> this RPG has been a very big part of my life. And like any other part of
> my life, I want things to get better. If I am elected to the council, I
> will do everything in my power to make things beter. I will listen to
> everyones ideas, and if they will help the RPG, I will try to impliment
> them. 
>  And if we want to talk about RP ability, you all know me. Even though
> this was my first RPG, I know the rules well, and rarely mode.
> I would like to think of everyone in this RPG as friends, and would
> appreciate you're vote. Thank you!
> 
> 
>

>
